member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Text

member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.UI
member.summary: This namespace defines common types for using Win2D with UI frameworks.

member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.UI.Xaml
member.summary: This namespace provides Win2D-enabled XAML controls.

summary.p: This namespace provides image manipulation effects such as blur and saturation.

Effects are a type of , so they can be displayed using or . The source data fed into an effect is also of type ICanvasImage, which allows you to connect either a bitmap or another effect. Complex image processing graphs can be constructed by chaining many effects together.

member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.DirectX
member.summary: This namespace defines DirectX types used for interop with other components.
member.remarks: When targeting the Windows universal app platform, this namespace is renamed to Windows.Graphics.DirectX.

member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.DirectX.Direct3D11
member.summary: This namespace defines Direct3D11 types used for interop with other components.
member.remarks: When targeting the Windows universal app platform, this namespace is renamed to Windows.Graphics.DirectX.Direct3D11.

member.name: N:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics
member.summary: This namespace defines Windows Runtime vector and matrix types. These are only used for data exchange, and do not include any methods for doing math with the values. For more complete functionality, see the .NET and C++ Windows.Foundation.Numerics namespaces.

remarks.p: When targeting the Windows universal app platform, this namespace is renamed to Windows.Foundation.Numerics.
See for more information about the numerics types on Windows 10.
